title: PvP.Net Patcher Kernel Is Not Responding
body:
When i try to open the launcher, the LoL icon appears, then a black box appears around it then it stops responding, this happens to me every couple of months or so but this time i cannot for the life of me find a fix. Anyone know how to fix?
Thanks!

replies.body: Does the black box appear by itself or only if you click the icon?
Only when i click on anything.... I've tried leaving and not clicking anything but then the icon disappears and nothing happens, its doesn't even appear as an open process.

>open process

Are you talking about your taskbar or task manager?

Anyway, what I would do is open League with admin rights, and let it sit there for around half an hour (if no error messages come up).
I mean in task manager, also thats what i did for it to just disappear.
Before we go on, I'd like to clarify; are you on Mac or Windows? Running in admin mode produces the same error (no difference to starting it normally)?
Im on windows, and yes, it produces the same error.
